content:
From: Jasmin Blanchette <jasmin.blanchette@inria.fr>
Dear colleagues,

Since 2012, Andrei, Dmitriy, me, and many others have been working on (co)datatypes and (co)recursion for Isabelle. In conjunction with the invited FroCoS/ITP/TABLEAUX 2017 talk, we had the opportunity to summarize our work in a single overview paper, which some of you might enjoy reading:

http://matryoshka.gforge.inria.fr/pubs/co_data_invited.pdf

(The camera-ready version is due on 26 June, in case you find some mistakes.)

Cheers,

Jasmin
